text: You recently developed a deep learning model. To test your new model, you trained it for a few epochs on a large dataset. You observe that the training and validation losses barely changed during the training run. You want to quickly debug your model. What should you do first?

choices.text: Verify that your model can obtain a low loss on a small subset of the dataset
Add handcrafted features to inject your domain knowledge into the model
Use the Vertex AI hyperparameter tuning service to identify a better learning rate
Use hardware accelerators and train your model for more epochs
